LanguageData.VBE_Bar.label: bar
LanguageData.VBE_Bar.description: A somewhat ornate countertop stocked to the brim with different vessels and devices for making a variety of drinks. An ice box, a series of taps, hoses, and carbonators means anybody tending it can brew much quicker than at a rudimentary brewery.
LanguageData.VBE_SodaFountain.label: soda fountain
LanguageData.VBE_SodaFountain.description: An all-in-one soda manufacturing unit. Syrup is mixed with water thoroughly, carbonated and then deeply chilled before being dispensed into sterilized bottles.
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyDistillery.label: ambrandy distillery
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyDistillery.description: A gilded distillery of very delicate craftsmanship meant for aging ambrosia must into a drinkable form.
LanguageData.VBE_WhiskeyCask.label: whiskey cask
LanguageData.VBE_WhiskeyCask.description: A huge barrel meant for aging a high volume of whiskey at once. Natural woody flavors are imparted into the mixture as the barrel itself absorbs a portion of the liquid during the fermenting process. Any sunlight hitting the barrel may slow down the fermenting process, or even ruin the whole batch.
LanguageData.VBE_TequilaBarrel.label: tequila barrel
LanguageData.VBE_TequilaBarrel.description: A small still and fermenter combo unit, perfect for storing behind the counter of a warm saloon, but doesn’t fare very well in rain.
LanguageData.VBE_VodkaDrum.label: vodka drum
LanguageData.VBE_VodkaDrum.description: A cheap container meant for storing water retrofitted to be air tight for short-term fermenting.
LanguageData.VBE_GinStill.label: gin still
LanguageData.VBE_GinStill.description: A fully metal industrial distilling device, meant to purify and ferment gin into a drinkable form. The metallic design means aging is possible in a wide range of temperatures and conditions.
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyAwful.description:
Also known as “liquid sunshine” ambrandy is a twice-fermented, distilled liquor of the highest calibre. Glitterworld aristocrats are known to send entire private militias to assist in shipping singular bottles.

Beyond being flavorful enough to bring one to tears, studies have found this liquor when deeply aged causes increased stimulation in the section of the human brain known for artistic creativity and expression while also dampening the section of the brain in control of emotions.

Even the bottle itself is a beauty to behold, when hit with even the tiniest amount of light golden flecks are seen dancing in the liquid within, like embers rising from a campfire. While Ambrandy can be mixed into cocktails, those few who have had the privilege to drink it say it is best on its own.
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyAwful.label: ambrandy (awful)
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyPoor.description:

While Ambrandy can be mixed into cocktails, those few who have had the privilege to drink it say it is best on its own.
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyPoor.label: ambrandy (poor)

Beyond being flavorful enough to bring one to tears, studies have found this liquor when deeply aged causes increased stimulation in the section of the human brain known for artistic creativity and expression while also dampening the section of the brain in control of emotions.

Even the bottle itself is a beauty to behold, when hit with even the tiniest amount of light golden flecks are seen dancing in the liquid within, like embers rising from a campfire. While Ambrandy can be mixed into cocktails, those few who have had the privilege to drink it say it is best on its own.
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyLegendary.label: ambrandy (legendary)
LanguageData.VBE_Gin.label: gin
LanguageData.VBE_Gin.description: A particularly mild and colorless spirit, aromatically speaking this bottle has a pine-tree like scent as well as subtle fruity notes. This liquor has a reputation for being light-hearted and fun to drink and for causing what is known as “gin drunkenness”, during which one feels increased empathy and understanding.
LanguageData.VBE_Tequila.label: tequila
LanguageData.VBE_Tequila.description: A fermented liquor made from agave sap, a favorite of wild, rowdy banditos and muffalo wranglers alike. Includes a high-protein snack at the bottom of the bottle believed to bring good luck. Imbibers are known to excel at extended combat.
LanguageData.VBE_Vodka.label: vodka
LanguageData.VBE_Vodka.description: A clear and mostly flavorless alcohol made from fermented potatoes. While vodka is drinkable alone it is mostly known for being a perfect mixing agent and for causing foolishly high levels of boldness in those who choose to drink it.
LanguageData.VBE_Whiskey.label: whiskey
LanguageData.VBE_Whiskey.description: A potent liquor distilled from fermented grain. The flavors of the aging barrel tend to permeate this spirit more than others. A woody, almost smokey flavor is pronounced throughout. Simple whiskeys are stereotypically associated with rough manual laborers and hard workers, a common sight in steamworlds across the galaxy.
LanguageData.VBE_DoubleWhiskey.label: double-aged whiskey
LanguageData.VBE_DoubleWhiskey.description: The result of whiskey being aged once more in an unused or lightly used secondary barrel. Flavor profiles are stronger and the afterburn in one's throat notably reduced. The increased aging time for fine whiskey generally portrays a sense of mercantilism and class among its consumers.
LanguageData.VBE_HotCoffee.label: coffee
LanguageData.VBE_HotCoffee.description: A warm, bitter beverage usually complemented with milk and sugar. A favorite among students and office workers across the galaxy due to high caffeine content and pleasing aroma.
LanguageData.VBE_IceCoffee.label: iced coffee
LanguageData.VBE_IceCoffee.description: An icy, chilled coffee. Chilling coffee is preferred by many in warmer climates, anecdotally it also smooths out bitter flavors and brings out noticeable, albeit subtle nuttiness. Just like its warm counterpart, it is ubiquitous among students and professionals alike.
LanguageData.VBE_EnergyDrink.label: energy drink
LanguageData.VBE_EnergyDrink.description: A sour and fizzy drink finished off with a hint of bitterness. The combination of sugar and caffeine means a burst of energy upfront, but with a crash later. Notable aftertaste of radiation.
LanguageData.VBE_Juice.label: juice
LanguageData.VBE_Juice.description: Juiced fruit, tart and tangy, can be made from a singular fruit or a mixed variety - Also known as a juice medley. Many drinks can be brewed or mixed using juices as base. While no more nutritious than non juiced fruit it is much easier to store and transport.
LanguageData.VBE_Soda.label: soda
LanguageData.VBE_Soda.description: A very sweet and semi-citrusy beverage best enjoyed chilled. Whilst not exactly nutritious the sugar rush is welcomed and the effervescence is quite refreshing.
LanguageData.VBE_Tea.label: tea
LanguageData.VBE_Tea.description: A pleasing, aromatic beverage prepared by steeping a bag of tea leaves in boiling water. Tea can range anywhere from citrusy to bitter to spicy flavor profiles. Tea has been one of humanity's favorite beverages since ancient times and is believed to possess many natural healing properties.
LanguageData.VBE_SimpleCocktail.label: simple cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_SimpleCocktail.description: A simple cocktail quickly mixed from a duo of ingredients.
LanguageData.VBE_FineCocktail.label: fine cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_FineCocktail.description: A fine complex cocktail, mixed precisely from multiple ingredients.
LanguageData.VBE_LavishCocktail.label: lavish cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_LavishCocktail.description: A masterpiece of bartending incarnate, this cocktail was mixed from a wide variety of ingredients and chilled to perfection before meticulously shaken and served.
LanguageData.VBE_GourmetCocktail.label: gourmet cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_GourmetCocktail.description: A veritable miracle of mixology. This cocktails every factor from temperature of glass, choice of stirring instrument and type of garnish has been precisely calculated for the maximum flavor and body possible.
LanguageData.VBE_SodaSyrup.label: soda syrup
LanguageData.VBE_SodaSyrup.description: A thick and disgustingly sweet mixture made by boiling citric acid and natural sugars together - Usually derived straight from cane sugar or as corn syrup. Must be cut with water and left to carbonate briefly in a sealed environment before consumption.
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyMush.label: ambrosia mush
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyMush.description: Sliced and pressed ambrosia, can be left alone to ripen into must to be further distilled into an extremely fine liquor.
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyMust.label: ambrandy must
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyMust.description: Fully ripened ambrosia liquified into essentially a thick juice and left alone to grow bacteria for fermenting. Ready to be distilled into a drinkable form.
LanguageData.VBE_WhiskeyMash.label: whiskey mash
LanguageData.VBE_WhiskeyMash.description: A starchy and mostly liquid mixture with pulpy chunks strewn throughout. Ready To be aged.
LanguageData.VBE_TequilaMust.label: tequila must
LanguageData.VBE_TequilaMust.description: A thin mixture of juiced agave sap or prickly cactus pear and insect meat starter, ready to be cut and fermented in a barrel.
LanguageData.VBE_VodkaMash.label: vodka mash
LanguageData.VBE_VodkaMash.description: A thick, starchy mash of raw potatoes and a starter, ready to be fermented.
LanguageData.VBE_GinMush.label: gin mush
LanguageData.VBE_GinMush.description: A clear but cloudy mixture of juiced berries and miscellaneous grain, ready to be fermented.
LanguageData.VBE_RawCoffee.label: coffee beans
LanguageData.VBE_RawCoffee.description: The pits of coffee plant berries, known succinctly as “coffee beans”. They can be roasted to bring out a robust and bitter flavor, as well as natural caffeine.
LanguageData.VBE_RawTea.label: tea leaves
LanguageData.VBE_RawTea.description: The leaves of the tea plant. They can be boiled into a variety of earthy and soothing beverages.
LanguageData.VBE_RawTobacco.label: tobacco leaves
LanguageData.VBE_RawTobacco.description: The leaves of the tobacco plant. Tobacco leaves can be dried quite easily to then be rolled and smoked, providing a mild stimulating effect.
LanguageData.VBE_Cigarettes.label: cigarettes
LanguageData.VBE_Cigarettes.description: A small, rolled paper tube stuffed loosely with tobacco leaves. Offers a brief euphoria as well as mental stimulation, and is very addictive. The pungent odor is generally disliked at first, but becomes much more pleasurable as the smoker becomes more addicted. Can be crafted without equipment, at a crafting spot.
LanguageData.VBE_Cigars.label: cigars
LanguageData.VBE_Cigars.description: A fat, dried tobacco leaf stuffed to the brim with more tobacco leaves and a gold foil wrap around it. Cigars have a historically posh presentation and are usually only affordable by those who mingle with glitterworld elite regularly. Cigars are often flavored with citrus or vanilla to make their flavor and odor less acrid.
LanguageData.VBE_Plant_Coffee.label: coffee plant
LanguageData.VBE_Plant_Coffee.description: A low-lying bush of tropical origin, dotted by small reddish berries when fully grown. The pits of these berries are known succinctly as “coffee beans” and can be roasted to bring out a robust and bitter flavor, as well as natural caffeine. This particular genus has been selectively bred for quick maturing compared to its ancient counterpart.
LanguageData.VBE_Plant_Tea.label: tea grass
LanguageData.VBE_Plant_Tea.description: A very leafy shrub that is particularly easy to cultivate. Since early mankind it was discovered the leaves of these plants can be boiled into a variety of earthy and soothing tea. This particular genus has been selectively bred for quick maturing compared to its ancient counterpart.
LanguageData.VBE_Plant_Tobacco.label: tobacco plant
LanguageData.VBE_Plant_Tobacco.description: A short, broad-leafed plant that thrives in warm climates. Tobacco leaves can be dried quite easily to then be rolled and smoked, providing a mild stimulating effect.
LanguageData.VBE_LuciferiumPowder.label: luciferium powder
LanguageData.VBE_LuciferiumPowder.description: A very finely blended powder made from luciferium. Usually put around rims of alcoholic drinks in bars frequented by the wealthy and powerful. Provides a very diluted version of the drug without risk of addictions.
LanguageData.VBE_WakeUpPowder.label: wake-up powder
LanguageData.VBE_WakeUpPowder.description: A crushed and powdered form of wake-up, surprisingly sweet and sometimes used as a replacement for sugar in desserts or dissolved into a morning espresso. Provides a very diluted version of the drug without risk of addictions.
LanguageData.VBE_GoJuiceStock.label: go-juice stock
LanguageData.VBE_GoJuiceStock.description: A gelatinized cube of Go-Juice, able to be digested rather than injected. While it can be used in any meal, it is often melted into soups or used as a thickening agent in cocktails. Provides a very diluted version of the drug without risk of addictions.
LanguageData.VBE_UnfermentedCider.label: unfermented cider
LanguageData.VBE_UnfermentedCider.description: Unfermented cider with a starter in an air-tight bottle. If left alone to develop the proper bacteria the end result will be a weak alcoholic beverage.
LanguageData.VBE_Cider.tools.0.label: bottle
LanguageData.VBE_Cider.tools.1.label: neck
LanguageData.VBE_Cider.label: cider
LanguageData.VBE_Cider.description: A barely alcoholic beverage meant to be refreshing and fruity. Try as anybody might it is pointless trying to get inebriated by cider alone, thus it is popular among those with prior addiction. Anecdotally, many praise it for supposed antioxidant properties.
